Defendant who introduced district traffic maps into evidence and was involved in a case regarding alien smuggling
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alberto Ramirez: Director of Transportation, Planning and Development for the Texas Department of Transportation, Laredo Division, testified about traffic flow data on FM 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent who provided testimony about usual traffic patterns on FM 2050 and worked at the Freer checkpoint since August 2011
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.J. Scott Hacker: United States Magistrate Judge who considered the evidence presented in the case and deferred to Agent Trevino's testimony regarding traffic patterns
